ComicInfo.Summary: Danse Macabre Part 3: The Secret Six and the Suicide Squad must put aside their differences in order to stand together against the Black Lantern Homicide Squad. Amanda reveals to King Faraday that she is Mockingbird.
ComicInfo.Title: Danse Macabre Part 3
